towerInfluenceModifier(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.rules.dynamic.CentaurRules
Method towerInfluenceModifier modifies the behaviour of the influence calculation: as stated in the game rules when the Centaur is activated the towers must not be counter in Island influence computation.
